title: Login Fails with SSO
content: Users cannot log in using Single Sign-On. Getting error code 401 Unauthorized. Issue started after recent security update.

title: Password Reset Not Working
content: Clicking password reset sends no email. Users check spam folder but nothing arrives. Issue affects all email providers.

title: Account Locked After 5 Attempts
content: User accounts are being locked after just 5 failed login attempts. Should be 10. Need to increase threshold.

title: 2FA SMS Not Received
content: Two-factor authentication SMS codes are not arriving within expected timeframe. Some users report 10+ minute delays.

title: Auth Token Expiration Too Quick
content: JWT tokens expire after 15 minutes which causes frequent re-authentication. Need to extend to 4 hours.

title: LDAP Integration Broken
content: LDAP authentication stopped working after server maintenance. Users with LDAP accounts cannot log in at all.

title: Social Login Callback Error
content: OAuth callbacks from Google/GitHub are failing with 500 errors. Certificate might be expired.

title: Session Timeout Too Aggressive
content: Users are being logged out after 30 minutes of inactivity. Should be 2 hours for better UX.

title: Forgot Password Link Expires
content: Password reset links expire after 24 hours. Users report missing emails and then link is invalid.

title: MFA Setup Not Completing
content: Users cannot complete MFA setup process. Stuck on verification step. Works for 10% of users.

title: Dashboard Slow on Chrome
content: Dashboard takes 30+ seconds to load in Chrome browser. Safari and Firefox are normal. Likely frontend issue.

title: API Response Time Degraded
content: API endpoints responding in 2-3 seconds instead of normal 200ms. Database queries are slow. May need indexing.

title: Search Feature Freezes UI
content: Searching for tickets freezes the entire application for 10+ seconds. Search results eventually load but UX is poor.

title: Modal Dialogs Not Responsive
content: Modal popups are not responsive on mobile devices. Touch interactions dont work properly.

title: Report Generation Timeout
content: Generating PDF reports times out for datasets with 10k+ records. Need better pagination or async processing.

title: Dark Mode Toggle Missing
content: Users request dark mode option for accessibility. Current UI is bright white only.

title: Font Size Not Customizable
content: Users with vision impairment cannot adjust font sizes. Fixed at 14px.

title: Mobile Navigation Menu Broken
content: Hamburger menu on mobile doesn't open properly. Icon visible but menu slides in partially.

title: Responsive Images Not Loading
content: Images don't scale properly on mobile. Appear cropped or stretched instead of responsive.

title: Loading Spinner Not Centered
content: Loading indicator appears off-center on some pages. Minor UX issue but looks unprofessional.

title: Add User Feature Missing
content: No UI option to add new users to workspace. Only admin API call works. Needs UI form.

title: Bulk Edit Not Available
content: Cannot edit multiple items at once. Need shift-click multi-select and bulk action panel.

title: Export to CSV Broken
content: Export CSV button visible but doesn't download anything. No error message shown either.

title: Import from Excel Failing
content: Users trying to import Excel files get generic error. No helpful validation messages.

title: Print Styling Issues
content: Printed pages have wrong margins and headers. CSS media queries for print need review.

title: Database Connection Pool Exhausted
content: App crashes when concurrent users exceed 50. Getting connection pool error. Need to increase pool size.

title: Query Timeout on Reports
content: Complex reports timeout after 30 seconds. Need query optimization or materialized views.

title: Backup Script Failing
content: Nightly backups not running. Cron job logs show permission denied errors on backup directory.

title: Memory Leak in Worker
content: Background worker process memory grows to 500MB then crashes. Likely event listener not cleaning up properly.

title: CPU Spikes During Peak Hours
content: System CPU usage hits 100% between 2-4 PM. Load balancer not distributing traffic evenly.

title: Disk Space Running Low
content: Server disk is 95% full. Logs are not being rotated. Cleanup is urgent.

title: Add Webhook Support
content: Users need webhook endpoints for integrations with Zapier and IFTTT. Currently no API for notifications.

title: OAuth2 Client Credentials
content: Implement client credentials flow for service-to-service authentication. Current JWT-only approach limits integrations.

title: Rate Limiting API
content: API needs rate limiting to prevent abuse. Currently anyone can make unlimited requests.

title: API Documentation Missing
content: Swagger/OpenAPI docs are outdated. Many endpoints not documented. Developers requesting current specs.

title: GraphQL Endpoint Needed
content: Some users prefer GraphQL over REST API. Should add GraphQL endpoint alongside REST.

title: Improve Error Messages
content: API error messages are technical and unhelpful. Need user-friendly error responses with recovery suggestions.

title: Add Pagination to Results
content: API returns all results which causes timeouts. Need cursor-based pagination or limit parameters.

title: Field Validation Weak
content: API accepts invalid data formats. Email fields accept anything. Need stricter schema validation.

title: Webhook Retry Logic
content: Webhooks fail once and dont retry. Need exponential backoff retry strategy for failed deliveries.

title: Add Logging Middleware
content: API requests and responses aren't logged. Need structured logging for debugging and monitoring.

title: CSV Upload Documentation
content: Help center lacks documentation on CSV import format and requirements. Users making lots of mistakes.

title: API Rate Limit Docs
content: Documentation doesn't explain rate limits or how to request higher limits. Causing confusion and support tickets.

title: Getting Started Guide Outdated
content: Quick start guide references deprecated endpoints. New users follow guide and hit errors.

title: Setup Instructions for Docker
content: Users want Docker setup instructions but only have VM docs. Need Dockerfile and docker-compose guide.

title: Database Schema Documentation
content: Database ER diagram missing. Developers working on integrations need to understand data model.

title: Integration Guide Needed
content: Partners need step-by-step integration guide with code examples. Currently only raw API docs.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
content: Users requesting dark mode for accessibility and reduced eye strain. Mentioned in 20+ support tickets.

title: Feature Request: Bulk Operations
content: Users want to bulk delete and bulk update items. Currently one-at-a-time only.

title: Feature Request: Custom Branding
content: White-label customers need to customize logo and colors. Currently hardcoded brand everywhere.

title: Feature Request: Advanced Filtering
content: Current filters are basic. Users need complex boolean queries on multiple fields.

title: Feature Request: Two-Way Sync
content: Users want bidirectional sync with Salesforce. Currently one-way only.

title: Feature Request: Real-Time Notifications
content: Users want push notifications for events. Currently email only.

title: Feature Request: Custom Fields
content: Users need ability to add custom metadata fields. Schema is fixed.

title: Feature Request: Webhook Events
content: Users need webhooks for workflow automation. Currently no events triggered.

title: Feature Request: SAML SSO
content: Enterprise customers require SAML support. Currently OAuth2 only.

title: Feature Request: Role-Based Access
content: Users need fine-grained permission control. Currently just admin/user binary.

title: Bug: Duplicate Entries Created
content: Bulk import sometimes creates duplicate records. No deduplication logic.

title: Bug: Missing Updated Timestamps
content: Some records dont have correct updated_at timestamps. May be SQL timestamp issue.

title: Bug: Timezone Handling Broken
content: Dates display wrong timezone. User in PST sees times in UTC. Need timezone conversion.

title: Bug: String Encoding Issues
content: Emoji and special characters display as question marks. UTF-8 encoding problem.

title: Bug: Float Precision Error
content: Decimal calculations slightly off. Money fields show 0.01 cent discrepancies. Float rounding issue.

title: Bug: Null Reference Exception
content: Sometimes getting null pointer errors in logs. Accessing property on undefined object.

title: Bug: Race Condition on Update
content: Concurrent updates corrupt data. Last write should win but both writes sometimes partially apply.

title: Bug: Cache Invalidation Failed
content: Updated records still show old values until cache expires. Need manual cache clear.

title: Bug: SQL Injection Vulnerability
content: User input in search field allows SQL injection. Need parameterized queries.

title: Bug: XSS in Comments
content: HTML in comments renders instead of escaping. Stored XSS vulnerability exists.

title: Bug: CSRF Token Missing
content: POST endpoints missing CSRF token validation. Forms vulnerable to cross-site attacks.

title: Bug: Password Stored in Logs
content: User passwords accidentally logged in debug output. Sensitive data exposure.

title: Bug: API Key Hardcoded
content: Third-party API key hardcoded in source code. Should use environment variables.

title: Performance: Optimize Database
content: Queries are inefficient. Need proper indexing strategy review.

title: Performance: Cache User Data
content: Frequently accessed user data not cached. Every request hits database.

title: Performance: Minify Assets
content: Frontend JS and CSS not minified. Wasting bandwidth on large files.

title: Performance: CDN Configuration
content: Static assets not served from CDN. Load times slow for international users.

title: Performance: Database Connection
content: Opening new connection per request instead of reusing pool.

title: Performance: Bundle Size
content: Frontend bundle is 2.5MB. Need code splitting and lazy loading.

title: Refactor Legacy Code
content: Old authentication module has duplicated code. Needs modernization.

title: Update Dependencies
content: npm packages 3+ versions behind. Security updates available but not installed.

title: Add Unit Tests
content: Code coverage is 15%. Need unit tests for critical business logic.

title: Fix Code Style
content: Inconsistent indentation and naming conventions across codebase. Need linter configured.

title: Setup CI Pipeline
content: No automated testing before deployment. Manual testing is error-prone.

title: Database Migration Needed
content: Schema changes queued but migration script hasn't run. Blocked on deployment.

title: Configuration Management
content: Environment configs hardcoded. Need proper config management per environment.

title: Logging Configuration
content: Debug logs too verbose. Production logs not capturing errors. Need log level management.
